summary: App includes a rooms feature: when a user adds a room, a new room card (name only) should appear immediately in the main rooms list, with the room name auto-generated (e.g., Room 1, Room 2) and editable later.
architectural_notes: Room creation should auto-generate default names sequentially (e.g., Room 1, Room 2) and support later renaming.
Rooms list UI should update immediately on add (optimistic UI/state update) to show the new room card without requiring reload.
known_issues: Bug: Adding a room does not show the new room card immediately in the rooms list (expected to appear instantly).

existing_features.title: Fix the Rooms page so that when the user increases the room count using the plus (+) control, a new room tile appears immediately in the main rooms grid (without requiring a page refresh).

Ensure newly displayed rooms have an auto-generated default name in English using the format "Room N" (matching the room number/id), and that the name can be edited later using the existing room editing UI.
Ensure the React Query room-list data refreshes reliably when the display count changes (increment/decrement), so that the UI state and fetched data stay in sync.

new_feature_requests.summary: When adding a room, immediately display a new room card (name only) in the main rooms list; auto-generate the room name (e.g., Room 1, Room 2) with ability to edit later.

projectName: Fix Rooms stepper so new room tiles appear immediately with auto-generated names
